page.title: 02Woolley C.E.First School.
page.content: Woolley School is old.It was built in 1842 and had three teachers_two lady teachers and the headmaster. The benches they used were joined to little wooden desks.They used slates and chalk to write with. Now the school has been modernised and we have a mobile classroom for the juniors.It came in two bits on two trucks.I was five or six when it came. The men made a rest to support the classroom. The juniors could not go in until it was decorated. Then we all celebrated with a drink of orange juice and a biscuit. I think it was a good idea to have an extra classroom. Now we have sixty- two children we need it.
